p:
Prevention of human to human transmission is the most challenging one worldwide since the onset of 1918 influenza pandemic.
3 SARS-CoV-2 spreads mainly through airborne transmission, respiratory droplets and contaminated areas. 4, 5 On 11 March 2020 World Health Organization declared the COVID-19 a pandemic.
6 Following that, most countries announced preparedness plans for COVID-19 including lockdown, self-isolation, social distancing, hand washing and wearing face mask.
